ch.epfl.lasec.universitycontest
Class DialogHandler

java.lang.Object
  ch.epfl.lasec.universitycontest.DialogHandler

public class DialogHandler
extends java.lang.Object

Handle the alert dialog. Only one can be viewed at the same time. Error messages quit the current activity. Info messages just show the dialog.

Author:
Sebastien Duc
